Name: Camomile & Blackthorn Breeze
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare lemon slice wheel for garnish.
Review: Adult, clean and subtle in flavour with a twang of fruit.
History: Created in 2002 by yours truly (Simon Difford) after a trip to Finland with Finlandia vodka.
Nutrition: One serving of Camomile & Blackthorn Breeze contains 141 calories
